definitions.title: n.pr.m. Esau
definitions.body: , Hsau;—Esau, elder son of Isaac Ge 25:25, Ge 25:26 + 7 t. Ge 25, Ge 26:34, Ge 27:1 + 24 t. Ge 27, Ge 28, Ge 32:4 + 15 t. Ge 32, Ge 33, Ge 35, Jos 24:4, Jos 24:4, Mal 1:2, Mal 1:3, 1Ch 1:34; identif. with [[אֱדוֹם]] Ge 36:1, Ge 36:8, Ge 36:19, ancestor of Edomites v:Ge 36:9; v:Ge 36:43, cf. 1Ch 1:35; dwelling in Mt. Seir Ge 36:8 (25 t. in all, Ge 36) De 2:5, Jos 24:4; [[בְּנֵי עֵשָׂו]] = Edomites De 2:4, De 2:8, De 2:12, De 2:22, De 2:29; [[עֵשָׂו]] = Edom Je 49:8, Ob:Ob 6, [[בֵּית עֵשָׂו]] v:Ob 18, v:Ob 18, [[הַר עֵשָׂו]] v:Ob 18, v:Ob 9, v:Ob 19, v:Ob 21.
